thread.title: New hotel group opens in Stuttgart, Germany
thread.title_full: New hotel group opens in Stuttgart, Germany

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: New hotel group opens in Stuttgart, Germany
text:
New hotel group opens in Stuttgart, Germany Original,   
Oct 02, 2015 eTN   
With the opening of its new hotel at the beginning of September, the A&O Group is now also represented in Stuttgart, Germany for the first time. 
Stuttgart's former "Milchhof" (dairy plant) has been completely gutted and refurbished. Following conversion work lasting around a year, the A&O hotel chain has now opened its doors to the public. 
Since 1st September 2015 the A&O Stuttgart City offers a combination of hostel and hotel under one roof. 
The hotel has 237 rooms in various different categories with a total of 924 beds.
